Text:
excellent, tx.

comics are in comic archive format, use something like:
http://www.cdisplay.me/
to view them.
Issue 26 (Retreat part 1) doesn't open for me using Comix viewer, but you can get that issue here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5004898/Angel_23_(Aftermath)_and_Buffy_S8_26_(Retreat)
Issue 26 works great for me in Evince!
